sn10.9:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn10.9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sukka bhikkhuni mahatiya parisaya parivuta dhammam deseti.
sn10.9:1.3: Atha kho sukkaya bhikkhuniya abhippasanno yakkho rajagahe rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
